title: Supply Chain Security and Software Bill of Materials
description:
In this technical talk, Dimitris Bougioukos shall discuss the state-of-play of securing software supply chains with the help of Software Bill of Materials (SBOMs). A Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) is a complete, formally structured list of components, libraries, and modules that are required to build a given piece of software and the supply chain relationships between them.

During the talk, the audience will get acquainted with:

  • Essential SBOM requirements
  • Prevalent SBOM standards
  • Commonly used tools for SBOM generation 
  • SBOM value to achieve security transparency in the software supply chain
